Specimen Type: Tumor biopsy tissue (fresh frozen tissue or formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block)
Purpose: To detect specific genetic rearrangements in lung tumor samples to aid in diagnosis and treatment planning.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or sterile container for fresh frozen tissue
Equipment: MAYOCOMPLETE LUNG REARRANGEMENTS Test Kit, microtome, DNA/RNA extraction kit, thermal cycler, real-time or digital PCR system, pipettes, vortex mixer, microcentrifuge
